name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 11: Meitantei Conan: The Board Game
overview: Simple Characters 2000 Series vol.11 - Meitantei Conan - The Board is a board game in which the player can play as Shininchi Kudo, Genta Kojima, Ayumi Yoshida, Mitsushiko Tsuburaya or Ai Haibara, the game features also a 4 human players vs mode. The game as usual in most of the PSX board games have some mini games.
